name: Neuromend
description:
Description

Neuromend was created for the 2017 Melbourne Global Game Jam.

Former henchmen and sidekicks have come to your team to learn how to rejoin society. Work as a team of 2-4 to each memorise a list and trigger brainwave recall together at the right time. Help our brave allies get back on their feet!

See the game page here: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/neuromend

Credits

Programmers:
Jacqui Hyslop and Timothy Patullock

Writer:
Anna Irwin-Schütze

Artists:
Jennifer Reuter and Simon Wall

Music/Sound Effects:
Anna Irwin-Schütze and Adam (Az) Scott-McGuinness
